page.title: 04Work,Education and Housing
page.content: Of the adult population,69% worked, and 21% were not working (83% being housewives,17% being unemployed),4% were students,and 6% were retired.Of those that worked,29% worked in Rayleigh,20% in London,and 43% in other local places.Of this group, 26% were Professional,20% had clerical jobs,and 14% were secrataries. Rayleigh's population had a varied education;41% went to Secondary Modern schools,33% went Grammer schools,14% went to comprehensive schools,and 2% went to University. 53% of the population lived in detached houses,33% in semi- detached houses,and 10% in Bungalows.98% of these were private homes,and the average number of bedrooms was 3.Previously,47% had lived in Semi- detached houses,and 22% in terraced houses.
